title: Addressing Unfair Practices in the Live Entertainment Industry
summary: This executive order aims to address issues within the live concert and entertainment sector by focusing on the impact of intermediaries who operate between artists and the market. The order outlines the purpose of fostering a fairer environment for artists in the industry by combating practices deemed unfair and detrimental to the integrity of live performances. It establishes a framework for evaluating and addressing these challenges in order to support the sustainability and growth of America's live entertainment sector.

title: Establishment of the United States Investment Accelerator
summary: This executive order aims to create the United States Investment Accelerator to streamline and enhance the regulatory processes that affect businesses during their development and operation. The intent is to simplify these processes in order to foster a more efficient environment for investment and economic growth within the United States.

title: Presidential Executive Order on Enhancing Safety and Aesthetics in Washington, D.C.
summary: This executive order outlines initiatives aimed at improving safety and the general appearance of Washington, D.C., the Federal capital city, designated as a location that represents all Americans. The order emphasizes the unique status of D.C. and the collective ownership by citizens across the nation. It establishes guidelines and objectives for maintaining and enhancing the city's environment to ensure it is safe and visually appealing for residents and visitors alike.

title: Proclamation on the Adjustment of Imports of Automobiles and Automobile Parts
summary: On February 17, 2019, the Secretary of Commerce submitted a report detailing an investigation into the impact of imports of various types of passenger vehicles and light trucks, categorized collectively as automobiles, on national security and the economy. This proclamation addresses the findings of that investigation and outlines potential adjustments to import regulations regarding automobiles and their parts in order to promote the interests of U.S. economic stability and national security.

title: Presidential Pardon Granted to Devon Archer
summary: This executive order, issued by President Donald J. Trump, announces the granting of a full and unconditional pardon to an individual named Devon Archer for specific offenses. The pardon is executed under the authority vested in the President by the Constitution, specifically Article II, Section 2, Clause 1. The document formalizes the clemency decision made by the President.
